name: Farm Tycoon - Idle Game
description:
Love farming?
Well, Farm Tycoon is here to meet your needs!

We are offering you to take ownership of the biggest farm in the county. From planting seeds to harvesting perfectly grown crops, there is no easier way to become the richest farmer ever!
Step into the shoes of a Tycoon runner and observe how your farmer minions work tirelessly to provide the best crop there can be. The “farm-bilities” are endless!

Features of Farm Tycoon - Idle Game :

• Worker minions that do all the hard farming part
• Earning lots and lots of $$$
• Start from 1 and grow countless crop fields
• Plant, water, and harvest (and do it all again!)
• Sell your yield & establish your tycoon in the market
• Every little task is a rewarded profit
